languages.text: "Выдающаяся беспомощность, Йегер. Я помогу вам, но только потому, что хочу поскорее убраться с этой планеты-свалки".
"Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."
languages.original_text: "Выдающаяся беспомощность, Йегер. Я помогу вам, но только потому, что хочу поскорее убраться с этой планеты-свалки".

traits.locale_text: "Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of planet as soon as possible."
"Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of planet as soon as possible."
"Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."
"Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."
"Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."
"Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."

languages.text: «Una ineptitud impresionante, Yeager. La ayudaré, pero solo porque quiero salir de esta pocilga de planeta cuanto antes».
languages.original_text: "Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: «Una ineptitud impresionante, Yeager. La ayudaré, pero solo porque quiero salir de esta pocilga de planeta cuanto antes».

languages.text: “你可真是个彻头彻尾的废物，耶格尔。很好，我可以帮你这个忙，但这仅仅是因为我想赶紧离开这个垃圾堆。”
languages.original_text: "Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: “你可真是个彻头彻尾的废物，耶格尔。很好，我可以帮你这个忙，但这仅仅是因为我想赶紧离开这个垃圾堆。”

languages.text: 「イェーガー、君は驚くほど愚かだ。君のことを助けようと思うが、それはできる限り早くこのゴミのような惑星から脱出したいからだ」
languages.original_text: "Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: 「イェーガー、君は驚くほど愚かだ。君のことを助けようと思うが、それはできる限り早くこのゴミのような惑星から脱出したいからだ」

languages.text: « Décidément, vous ne servez pas à grand-chose, Yeager. Je vais vous aider, mais uniquement parce que je tiens à quitter ce trou dès que possible. »
languages.original_text: "Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: « Décidément, vous ne servez pas à grand-chose, Yeager. Je vais vous aider, mais uniquement parce que je tiens à quitter ce trou dès que possible. »

languages.text: "Hayret verici bir beceriksizlik Yeager. Sana yardım edeceğim ama sırf şu gezegen müsveddesinden bir an önce kurtulmak istediğimden."
languages.original_text: "Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Hayret verici bir beceriksizlik Yeager. Sana yardım edeceğim ama sırf şu gezegen müsveddesinden bir an önce kurtulmak istediğimden."

languages.text: "Eine bemerkenswerte Unfähigkeit, Yeager. Ich werde Euch helfen, allerdings nur, weil ich diese Kloake von einem Planeten möglichst schnell verlassen will."
languages.original_text: "Remarkable ineptitude, Yeager. I will assist you, but only because I want to get off this dump of a planet as soon as possible."

traits.locale_text: "Eine bemerkenswerte Unfähigkeit, Yeager. Ich werde Euch helfen, allerdings nur, weil ich diese Kloake von einem Planeten möglichst schnell verlassen will."
